name: super-marketplace-poc
description: POC for Super Marketplace with App 1 making direct API calls and App 2 using API Gateway SDK for embedded iframe communication

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:app1" "npm run start:app2" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:app1" "npm run dev:app2" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.build: npm run build:app1 && npm run build:app2 && npm run build:gateway
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app1 && npm install && cd ../app2 && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../api-gateway-sdk && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules app1/node_modules app2/node_modules server/node_modules api-gateway-sdk/node_modules

author: Your Name
